CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT , CHI and INV enter the room . MOT is carrying CHI in her arms . INV explains warm-up task to MOT
CHI looks down at the floor and at INV
MOT puts CHI down on the floor
CHI looks down at the car
MOT puts her pocketbook down on the floor
MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
CHI picks up the toy duck and squeezes it
<bef> MOT opens her mouth wide at CHI and then looks up the wall
CHI looks down at the duck
CHI bangs on the lid of the jack+in+the+box
<bef> CHI looks up at the jack+in+the+box .
CHI turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI gets stuck and cannot turn the handle any more
MOT comes over to CHI to help her
<$=1> MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
CHI plays with the clown's hand
CHI bounces the clown and then pushes him into the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes the clown down into the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes the jack+in+the+box in front of MOT
CHI turns to look at something else on the floor
<$=1> MOT looks at CHI and smiles
<bef> CHI turns around and sits on the duck and then lifts up
CHI has her back to the camera
CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box
<bef> MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI picks up the picture book
CHI walks over to the panda bear chair
CHI sits on the chair and opens the book
CHI holds the book out to MOT
MOT points to the pictures in the book
MOT holds the book in front of CHI
CHI runs over to another chair
CHI points to the design on the cushion
CHI tries to get her leg on the chair
MOT shows CHI a picture in the book
<bef> CHI tries to climb on the chair
CHI turns and looks at the picture in the book
MOT gestures to the jack+in+the+box as she holds the book . MOT looks at CHI and smiles
CHI looks at the picture in the book
<bef> MOT smiles at CHI . MOT watches CHI
CHI manages to pull herself up onto the chair
CHI slides back off the chair
CHI turns and presses both of her hands firmly on the cushion of the chair
MOT shakes her head and watches CHI
CHI tries to climb on the chair from the front
CHI walks over to the table restlessly
MOT extends her hand to CHI
CHI holds out her hand to MOT
MOT helps CHI climb up onto the chair
MOT looks at CHI and smiles
CHI slides off the chair again . CHI sits down in front of the toys on the floor
MOT begins to wind the jack+in+the+box
CHI backs away from the jack+in+the+box quickly
<bef> MOT opens the jack+in+the+box and turns it so that the clown faces CHI
MOT gestures to CHI with her hands
CHI bends over and peeks at the clown and then looks across the room
CHI runs over to the chair near the door
CHI starts to pull MOT's purse off of the chair

INV enters the room to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters at 12:20:16 and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV gives CHI the beads to hold
INV opens the drawer and takes out the object
CHI plays with the beads in her hands
INV puts the Forbidden Object on the table
MOT looks at CHI and shakes her head
CHI drops the beads into her lap
CHI slips the beads onto her arm and then tries to grab the object
MOT pulls CHI arm back from the object
MOT keeps CHI hands away from the object with her hands
<bef> INV starts to put the object away
<bef> INV holds the object together and lets CHI touch the balls on the end of the object
INV points to some of the balls on the object
CHI looks down at the balls as she touches them
INV puts the object into the drawer
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up toys from the Small Scale Activity . CHI gets up and walks over to the desk followed by MOT
CHI looks up on the desk top
MOT holds box down low for CHI
CHI takes the ball out of the box
MOT puts the box down on the floor
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
MOT puts the box down in front of CHI
the ball bounces off the edge of the box
CHI retrieves the ball and throws it in the box
<bef> MOT sits on the floor next to the box . <1> MOT claps her hands together
<aft> MOT takes the ball out of the box
CHI walks over to the table
CHI goes over to the table and pulls out the chair
CHI pulls the chair back from the table
CHI is playing with the chair strap
MOT puts the ball in the box
CHI starts to climb onto the chair
MOT puts the box away on the desk
while MOT is putting the ball box away she is out of camera view
CHI looks up at MOT briefly
CHI still is playing with straps of the chair
CHI tugs on the chair strap
CHI glances up at MOT briefly
MOT uncovers her face but her upper body is out of camera view
CHI plays with the strap on the chair
CHI tries to climb in the chair
CHI pays little attention to MOT
MOT covers herself with the towel
CHI pushes the chair up to the table
CHI struggles with the chair with her back to MOT
ending the activity at this point was due to CHI's total lack of interest
CHI tries to push the chair into the table
CHI tries to climb into the chair
CHI pays no attention to MOT
CHI pushes herself into the large chair
MOT gets up to help CHI
MOT pulls the chair over to her and then MOT covers CHI face with the cloth
MOT pushes CHI in the chair
CHI gets off the chair and starts to push it away from the table
MOT stands near the desk and watches CHI
MOT puts the cloth on the desk
MOT is out of camera view
CHI continues to push the chair around
MOT stands next to the table and examines the boxes
CHI turns to look at MOT
MOT reaches in the box as she holds it in front of CHI
CHI reaches for the contents of the box
MOT puts a piece of paper on the table for CHI
MOT puts the crayons on the table and looks at CHI
CHI pulls the chair out and tries to climb into it
<bef> MOT pulls the chair out some more
<aft> CHI starts to climb into the chair
MOT lifts CHI up into chair

g.ga: buckle the seat belt on the chair
buckle the seat belt on the chair

u.a: MOT tries to fasten the straps of the chair
CHI tries to pull the straps together over the arms of the chair
MOT tries to take the straps from CHI
MOT takes the straps from CHI
MOT puts the straps under the arms and on CHI lap
MOT stands nearby and watches CHI
MOT stands helplessly looking at CHI
the belt falls off of CHI's lap
MOT tries to help CHI grab the straps
CHI reaches into the box and puts the crayon back
CHI draws . <aft> CHI stops drawing and takes another crayon out of the box and draws with it
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI switches colors again and resumes drawing . <aft> CHI throws the crayon in the box
MOT brings the lid of the box over to CHI
CHI puts the paper in the box
CHI tries to get out of the chair with the belt
<$=1> MOT comes over to CHI and undoes the straps
MOT takes the box with the book in it off the table
CHI gets off the chair and runs over to the boxes on the table
MOT holds the box with the book in it before CHI and pats the other boxes to gets CHI's attention
CHI turns and looks in the box
CHI takes the book out of the box
MOT sits down on the floor
CHI goes over to the white chair and tries to sit on it
MOT takes the book from CHI
CHI looks down at the book
MOT looks at the cover of the book
MOT shows CHI the hologram on the cover of the book
CHI gets off the chair to examine the buckle
MOT finds the strap and sets it on the chair
MOT helps CHI with the straps
CHI takes the straps and closes them herself
CHI tries to fasten the seat belt again
CHI caught her finger in strap
CHI looks at a picture of a cow
MOT shows CHI the hologram on the front of the book by tilting it back and forth
CHI tries to undo the seatbelt on chair
CHI looks at MOT and at the book
CHI gets out if the chair
INV enters the room . End of PCI - Book
